ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Freedom from the limitations of your personal self and feeling a unity or bond with what was felt to be greater than your personal self.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of pure being and pure awareness (beyond the world of sense impressions).

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of oneness in relation to an ''inner world'' within

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of the fusion of your personal self into a larger whole.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of unity with ultimate reality.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Feeling that you experienced eternity or infinity.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of oneness or unity with objects and/or persons perceived in your surroundings.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of the insight that ''all is One''.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Awareness of the life or living presence in all things.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Gain of insightful knowledge experienced at an intuitive level.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Certainty of encounter with ultimate reality (in the sense of being able to ''know'' and ''see'' what is really real at some point during your experience.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: You are convinced now, as you look back on your experience, that in it you encountered ultimate reality (i.e., that you ''knew'' and ''saw'' what was really real)
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Sense of being at a spiritual height.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Sense of reverence.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Feeling that you experienced something profoundly sacred and holy.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of amazement.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Feelings of tenderness and gentleness.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Feelings of peace and tranquility.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of ecstasy.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Sense of awe or awesomeness.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Feelings of joy.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Loss of your usual sense of time.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Loss of your usual sense of space.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Loss of usual awareness of where you were.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Sense of being ''outside of'' time, beyond past and future.
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Being in a realm with no space boundaries
Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Experience of timelessness.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Sense that the experience cannot be described adequately in words.

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Feeling that you could not do justice to your experience by describing it in words

Looking back on the entirety of your psilocybin session, please rate the degree to which at any time during the session you experienced the phenomena: Feeling that it would be difficult to communicate your own experience to others who have not had similar experiences.
